name: Void Timeline
description:
Just another day in a vast timeless space, one could imagine that between screams of Roaming Marauders, and cannon barrages of Space Crusaders, there will be at least some time to enjoy the view outside the window and simply relax. Even ten seconds of peace would be nice, but they keep coming one by one…

Void Timeline is a tactics game where you command a ship and battle enemy vessels from parallel universes. Fill out the ten-second bar with just the right combination of actions to destroy your enemy with minimal losses.

The game was created during Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam with a theme Every 10 seconds by:

Hex - Twitter
Kusy - Twitter
Sushi - Twitter
LittleMayBee
Yeris - Twitter
HaaYaargh - Twitter
